document_data.name: ''Studded Leather of the Shield''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Studded leather of the shield''''' were types of [[enchanted]] [[light armor]] imbued with defensive magics.
document_data.Powers: These sets of armor proved regular protection on par with mundane [[studded leather]]s. Its surface was studded with metal [[rivet]]s placed close together and forming a flexible layer of metal atop a layer of [[leather]]. Additionally, the wearer was able to cast the ''[[shield]]'' [[spell]] twice per day.
document_data.History: Some of these sets of magic armor were in use ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1312}} in the [[Spine of the World]] and the [[Frozenfar]] regions of [[Northwest Faer√ªn]].
